body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Junior Ranger            Earn a badge for César E. Chávez National Monument by completing activities in our junior ranger book! Pick up a free booklet at the visitor center and complete the activities for your age group. When you're done, bring your completed booklet to the visitor center's information desk. If you're not planning to visit the park soon but would still like to earn a badge, you can print the booklet at home and then mail the completed book back to us. First, download the Junior Ranger Booklet. When you print, be sure to choose the Booklet printing option and use legal-size paper. When you've completed the activities for your age group, mail your completed book to the address below. Be sure to include your return address! César E. Chávez National Monument Attn:  Junior Ranger Program PO Box 201 Keene, CA 93531
title: César E. Chávez National Monument: Be A Junior Ranger
